https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/reIKTGNpln6bXJw8sczz97SGR9u.jpg The Renaissance master Botticelli spent over a decade painting and drawing hell as the poet Dante described it. The film takes us on a journey through hell with fascinating and exciting insights into Botticelli's art and its hidden story. Botticelli – Inferno
